title: They Came for Nurses. What They’re Really Coming for Is Women’s Power—and Your Healthcare.
description: In a quiet regulatory maneuver with seismic consequences, the U.S. Department of Education—under the direction of Republican members of Congress—has proposed reclassifying all graduate nursing degrees as “non-professional.” What sounds like an obscure bureauc…
content: Morgan Fischer, winner of the 2025 National Magnet Nurse of the Year award for Transformational Leadership, in the labor and delivery unit at Texas Children’s Hospital in Houston on Nov. 12, 2025. (R… [+5545 chars]
